english_example_sentence: If I explain this difficult topic patiently, everyone will understand.
russian_example_sentence: Если я терпеливо объясню эту сложную тему, все поймут.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu zor konuyu sabırla açıklasam, herkes anlar.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu zor konuyu sabırla ______, herkes anlar.
